  • Method Details

    • validateSignature

      ExtendedJOSESigvalResult validateSignature(JOSESignatureData signatureData)
      validates the signature represented by a single JOSE signature element
      Parameters:
      signatureData - JOSESignatureData signature data extracted for this signature
      Returns:
      ExtendedJOSESigvalResult signature validation result

    • getCertificateValidator

      se.idsec.signservice.security.certificate.CertificateValidator getCertificateValidator()
      Ge the certificate validator. This function is added to support the extended interface of the JOSE document validator. This is based on an assumption that signservice commons will be amended with a JOSE module that is implemented in the same manner as the corresponding XML and PDF modules
      Returns:
      certificate validator
